publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-619 Mr Ted Brocklebank: St. Andrew’s Week Celebrations—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the St Andrew’s Week celebrations that demonstrate the best of traditional Scottish culture through a host of events and activities showing the rich heritage of Scotland’s music, arts, crafts and food and pays tribute to the local St Andrew’s Society for its dedication in organising cultural and gastronomic tributes to Scotland’s patron saint for over twenty years.
S2M-619 St. Andrew's Week Celebrations (lodged on 18 November 2003) Iain Smith*

S2M-619 Mr Ted Brocklebank: St. Andrew's Week Celebrations-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the St Andrew's Week celebrations that demonstrate the best of traditional Scottish culture through a host of events and activities showing the rich heritage of Scotland's music, arts, crafts and food and pays tribute to the local St Andrew's Society for its dedication in organising cultural and gastronomic tributes to Scotland's patron saint for over twenty years. Supported by: Iain Smith
S2M-619 St. Andrew's Week Celebrations (lodged on 18 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-619 St. Andrew's Week Celebrations (lodged on 18 November 2003) Murdo Fraser*
S2M-619 St. Andrew's Week Celebrations (lodged on 18 November 2003) Tricia Marwick*, John Swinburne*
S2M-619 St. Andrew’s Week Celebrations (lodged on 18 November 2003) John Scott*
